description: Blood products that are acceptable to a patient for use during an emergency in labor and delivery (L&D).

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREG_PLAN_BLOOD_PROD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is intended to indicate the types of blood transfusion products that are acceptable to the patient in the case of an emergency, particularly during labor and delivery.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Refuses All


All


PRBC


Platelets


Cryoprecipitate


Cell Saver


Whole Blood


Albumin


Fresh Frozen Plasma


Plasma Protein Fraction


DDAVP


Rhogam


Erythopoietin


Immunoglobulins


Tisseel


Other
